rules_text:
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.
Exile target nonland permanent you control, then return it to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
[i]“Daisy, you're as beautiful as the stars. What a match; I'm half-doomed and you're semisweet.”
— Dr. Sadie Dal to Lieutenant Saxon[/i]
